calculate_fc

Source: R/fold_change.R
calculate_fc.Rd

Calculate fold change.

calculate_fc(
  object,
  by,
  control_group,
  case_group,
  mean_median = c("mean", "median")
)

Arguments

object

tidymass-class object.
by

one column of sample_info from object.
control_group

A character vector, names from the by.
case_group

A character vector, names from the by.
mean_median

mean or median.

Value

object with fold change in variable_info.

Author

Xiaotao Shen shenxt1990@163.com

Examples

library(massdataset)
library(ggplot2)
data("expression_data")
data("sample_info")
data("sample_info_note")
data("variable_info")
data("variable_info_note")

object =
create_tidymass_class(
expression_data = expression_data,
sample_info = sample_info,
variable_info = variable_info,
sample_info_note = sample_info_note,
variable_info_note = variable_info_note
)
object =
  calculate_fc(
  object = object,
  by = "class",
  control_group = c("Blank", "QC"),
  case_group = c("Subject"),
  mean_median = "mean"
)
#> Warning: NA will be removed in the calculation
#> 4 control samples.
#> 4 case samples.
#> 
head(extract_variable_info(object))
#>                 variable_id        mz        rt        fc
#> M136T55_2_POS M136T55_2_POS 136.06140  54.97902 1.3737571
#> M79T35_POS       M79T35_POS  79.05394  35.36550 1.4420005
#> M307T548_POS   M307T548_POS 307.14035 547.56641 0.6794631
#> M183T224_POS   M183T224_POS 183.06209 224.32777 1.0000000
#> M349T47_POS     M349T47_POS 349.01584  47.00262 1.0869475
#> M182T828_POS   M182T828_POS 181.99775 828.35712 1.5222169
object =
  calculate_fc(
    object = object,
    by = "class",
    control_group = c("Blank", "QC"),
    case_group = c("Subject"),
    mean_median = "median"
  )
#> Warning: NA will be removed in the calculation
#> 4 control samples.
#> 4 case samples.
#> 
head(extract_variable_info(object))
#>                 variable_id        mz        rt        fc      fc.1
#> M136T55_2_POS M136T55_2_POS 136.06140  54.97902 1.3737571 1.1926748
#> M79T35_POS       M79T35_POS  79.05394  35.36550 1.4420005 1.4704801
#> M307T548_POS   M307T548_POS 307.14035 547.56641 0.6794631 0.7932409
#> M183T224_POS   M183T224_POS 183.06209 224.32777 1.0000000 1.0000000
#> M349T47_POS     M349T47_POS 349.01584  47.00262 1.0869475 1.1170469
#> M182T828_POS   M182T828_POS 181.99775 828.35712 1.5222169 1.3865259
